game.title: Vox Games
game.description: Regions of Ruin is a 2D pixel side-scrolling RPG with town-building, where you explore, fight and build into an open world that progressively challenges you and your settlement, and threatens the extinction of the dwarven race.

history.text: Ever wonder what would happen if Kingdom met a broad, skill based open world RPG? Welcome to Regions of Ruin. Regions of Ruin is a 2D side-scrolling RPG with town-building where you are introduced to an open world that progressively challenges your hero and settlement the further you delve into the vast continent. You will discover a foreboding land ravaged by hundreds of years of hardship. Where, kingdoms have risen and fallen, settlements have been laid to waste and overrun by warring groups, and great mysteries lay hidden and waiting to be unearthed - assuming you can defeat their jealous guardians.

ul.li:
Huge Continent to Explore!
Open world exploration with a hand crafted environment, no randomized maps or levels, everything you see has been made with care!

Styled combat system with stats and leveling
Employ stamina, stealth, and a variety of weapons and tactics to take down your enemies. Choose between ranged or close-range weapons, shields and more!

Accessible Gameplay
An array of difficulty settings will allow you to enjoy the game in a more casual manner or challenge yourself in Hardcore Mode where your foes are much stronger!

Backstory and Deep Lore
Learn the tragic tale of the downfall of the dwarven empire, the fate of past heroes and more through gameplay, collecting journals and more. Take on a multitude of quests, and explore the storyline as you work to rebuild your home.

Advance your skills through the skill trees
Advance your skills and build your hero through multiple skill trees. Gain a variety of increasingly powerful strikes and combos for both weapons and shields.

Rescue and recruit dwarves for your township (save them from extinction!)
Explore ruins, fight the bad guys, and rescue enslaved dwarves being held by enemies across the continent. Bring them back to your settlement and build your town, employing their various skills. Send them back to previously explored regions to gather more resources for your growing township!

Extenisve loot, including forging and crafting!
Discover countless items and gear on your journey, or forge and craft your own! Find something you don't need? Smelt it down for valuable resources!
